debt_section: As of December 31, 2023, The Coca-Cola Company had total debt of $25,005 million. The company's leverage ratio was 2.14x EBITDA. Management remains committed to maintaining investment-grade credit ratings and strong liquidity.
earnings_excerpt: The Coca-Cola Company reported strong results for fiscal year 2023. Operating margin was 14.5%, reflecting continued focus on operational efficiency. Management provided guidance for continued growth in the coming year.
